page.title: 10 Waverley Squash Club
page.content: The{Waverley Squash and Social {Club}is almost opposite William Cobbett School. It is quite a large building, housing 8 squash courts and a large bar-lounge. You have to be a member at Waverley to be able to hire a court there. At off peak times such as the afternoon on weekdays, it costs Â£1.20 for a court for 45 minutes. At peak times such as Saturday and Sunday it costs Â£1.80.Junior members can only book courts at off peak times.The club organises championships, squash rallies and tournaments. Also there are leagues for juniors,men and women. There is a large bar upstairs where people meet to have a drink and to talk. Also ,downstairs there are showers and changing rooms.
